title: A Case study in mechanism (TEFC)
creator_credit: Open University, BBC-TV and David Jackson
brief_description: An examination of the benzyne mechanism for nucleophilic aromatic substitution. Queries whether SN1 or SN2 mechanisms for nucleophilic substitution at a saturated carbon atom can be applied at an unsaturated or aromatic carbon atom. Looks at evidence for a modified version of the SN2 mechanism.
